text:
Amalia or Ludwigovna? 

Tense room, Katerina and Raskolnikov confront Amalia.  
“Close that door! Let him die in peace!”  

Katerina: “You must listen! Semyon is dying!”  

Raskolnikov: “He deserves dignity in his last moments.”  

---  

Katerina rushes to Semyon, urgency in her eyes.  
“Please, Semyon! Stay with us!”  

Semyon: “I... can’t... breathe...”  

Raskolnikov: “Help is coming, hold on!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna insists on the importance of dignity for the dying Semyon Zaharovitch, urging Amalia Ludwigovna to allow him peace in his final moments.
